example.eg: In Europe, plugs have two pins, whereas in the UK, they have three.
example.egtrans: 在欧洲，插头有两极，而在英国，插头有三极。

example.eg: Don't stick your fingers in the plug; you might get a nasty shock.
example.egtrans: 别把你的手指伸进插座里，免得触电。

example.eg: You need to put the plug in if you want to fill the sink with water.
example.egtrans: 如果要往水池里装满水，你需要用塞子把下水口塞住。

example.eg: Paula used a wad of paper as a plug to fill the hole.
example.egtrans: 宝拉用一个纸团当做塞子来堵住这个洞。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 塞子，栓，堵塞物, 填料

example.eg: Paula plugged the hole with a wad of paper.
example.egtrans: 宝拉用一团纸塞住了洞。

example.eg: Tom plugged the vacuum cleaner into the socket.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 用插头将…与电源连接, 插电

example.eg: The actor appeared on the talk show so that she could put in a plug for her latest film.
example.egtrans: 那个演员现身脱口秀，为自己的新电影做广告。

example.eg: Janine is changing the plugs on that old Ford.
example.egtrans: 亚尼内正在给那辆老福特车更换火花塞。

example.eg: The author appeared on the talk show to plug his latest book.
example.egtrans: 为了推销自己的新书，作者参加了谈话节目。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 推广, 推销, 为…大作广告

example.eg: He plugged in the television and switched it on.

dsense.name: earplug, ear plug, ear-plug
dsense.guideword: usually plural (plug worn in ears to block noise)

example.eg: Remember to put earplugs in before entering the woodshop.
The purpose of a glow plug is to heat the cylinder not to ignite the fuel.
You'll need a plug adaptor to put the flat-prong plug in a round-prong outlet.

dsense.name: Plug and Play, plug and play

example.eg: Plug and Play allows the operating system to detect new hardware and configure it automatically.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 即插即用的，直接自动运行的

example.eg: To view videos on this website, you need to install a plug-in.
The pen drive is a simple plug-in USB device.
A power plug is something you plug into an electrical outlet.
Janet made her husband promise that, if she ever ended up in a vegetative state, he would pull the plug.
This project is losing us money; it's time we pulled the plug on it.

dsense.name: spark plug, also UK: sparking plug

example.eg: There was nothing seriously wrong with the car – we just needed to change the spark plugs.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 火花点火引擎, 火花塞

example.eg: The new manager sparkplugged greater productivity among the sales team.
